imageCallout.title: 620 Loft & Garden
imageCallout.description: Expertly manicured rooftop garden with up-close views of St. Patrick’s Cathedral and Fifth Avenue.

image.alt: Guest at the private event space enjoying the NYC views.
Entertainment at a private event in Rock Center's Rainbow Room.

fullCard.title: Rainbow Room
fullCard.description: Created to be in a class of its own, Rainbow Room is the epitome of New York Style and glamour. A place where the food, the setting, the service, the skyline, and the stars all come together to create incomparable, unforgettable private events.

image.alt: Light pours in through an art deco window at the Rainbow Room.

cards.title: The Gallery
cards.description: Adjacent to the Rainbow Room, The Gallery is an intimate event space with south facing windows filled with views of Manhattan and the Empire State Building.

image.alt: Dining at Rockefeller Center with Manhattan sklyine views.

cards.title: Private Dining Room
cards.description: With walls of windows that afford sweeping views of Midtown Manhattan, the Private Dining Room never fails to impress for meetings or special occasions.

image.alt: Night skyline views on Manhattan from Rockefeller Center's rooftop bar.

cards.title: Bar SixtyFive
cards.description: A rooftop bar above the rest. Where cocktails and views create the perfect mix for memorable events.

capacity.title: Rainbow Room | The Gallery | Bar SixtyFive

image.alt: Ice skaters on the rink at Rockefeller Center

imageCallout2.title: The Rink
imageCallout2.description: Let one of New York’s most iconic, and playful, settings lend its magic to your event.

featuredStories.title: The Center Magazine.
featuredStories.caption: See the style, the details, and the smiles from events across Rockefeller Center.
